dubayi rajyaye wesena shri lankikayange jathika abhimanaya sankethawath karamin ‘wasantha udanaya 2014’ maha bakmaha ulela saha sumiyuru sangitha sandawa mewara da athi uthkarshawath lesa pawathwe.helaye maha sanskruthika mangalyaya lesa salakena bakmahe asiriya hama hadawathakama modu karamin mema awurudu ulela pawathwenne ape iparani jana kridawalata pramukhathwaya laba demini.aprel 10 wani brahaspathinda sawasa 6.00 ta abudabi siti golf klab kridanganayedi ha aprel 11 wani sikurada sawasa 1.00 sita dubayi hi ‘wondarland’ udyanayedi pasuda pahanwanathuru mema sangitha prasanga pawathwe.priya suriyasena, chandani hettiaarachchi, amila nadishani, ruwan hettiaarachchi, romesh sugathapala, supun rashmika, asanka dewamithra, farni roshini, doni imasha, kumara wandurassa, muthupura siya, shantha jayasinha, es. em. es. pranandu, nimasha da silwa athulu diwayine janapriya gayaka, gayikawan gi gayana mema sangitha prasangayan hi sangithaya sapayanu labanne ajith withanage pramukha siduwa sakura sangitha kandayamayi.
